cause.description:
Although cheerleading might have once been characterized by only wholesome ambitions of inspiring team and crowd momentum, it has since degraded into an overtly sexual spectacle. Permitting underaged women to star in these perverted performances inherently encourages the sexualization of elementary- and high school-age girls, as well as the idea that females' bodies are more worthy of attention than their minds. Ultimately, cheerleading is a means of degrading women and subtely promoting pedophilia.
1. Cheerleading in the USA is primarily an overtly sexual spectacle.
2. The mind of a female is more important than her body.
cause.mission: abolish or radically reform pre-adult cheerleading
cause.name: Pre-Adult Cheerleading Promotes Pedophilia
